title: Account STILL transferring after 24+ hours
body:
I changed my region from EUW to NA in order to play with my brother and his friends there (no i don't mind the ping lol) yesterday around 21:30GMT and when i tried to log in (on both the NA and EUW servers) it says "Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in a few minutes". I have been checking regularly for the past 26 hours and still no joy. 

It would have been no big deal but I only get 3 days a fortnight with which to play League with my friends due to my work, so instead of feeding on Tryndamere for hours on end I've resorted to going outside *shudders* in order to pass the time. 

Please could somebody enlighten me as to why it is taking so long? I read up on the FAQ and they stated the transfer should be near instantaneous hence my confusion

Thanks in advance

replies.body: Fixed!  It looks like you were stuck mid-transfer for some reason.  It's a super rare occurrence, but I'm glad you reached out so we can take a look.  Your account has now transferred to NA.  I hope that helps!

Oh my god thank you so much! I noticed it had fixed itself so I've just been on to play a game with my friends before they got off for the day but i thought it had just fixed itself. 

Thanks again for the help that's awesome :)
